targets.query: SELECT mean("latency") FROM "latency" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)

description: This is experimental dashboard for Percona Monitoring and Management (PMM) which provides CPU utilization details for multi-core systems.  It allows to easily see if overall CPU usage is high or if there are overloaded cores.

panels.content: Per CPU usage Information shows  usage for each CPU (Virtual) core.  The Current (most recent) numbers are shown together with history as sparkline
panels.title: Per Core CPU Usage

title: CPU Utilization Details (Cores)
